name: LevelOfSeverityOfRetinopathyFindings
title: Level of Severity of Retinopathy Findings
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the level of severity of retinopathy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication, or could be used as a Diagnosis, or as an attribute to represent exam findings.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with mild non-proliferative, moderate non-proliferative, severe non-proliferative, very severe non-proliferative, and proliferative diabetic retinopathy.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Mild nonproliferative retinopathy co-occurrent and due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Moderate nonproliferative retinopathy co-occurrent and due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Severe nonproliferative retinopathy co-occurrent and due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Very severe nonproliferative retinopathy co-occurrent and due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
Proliferative retinopathy co-occurrent and due to diabetes mellitus (disorder)
